DOC.brief_summary: Compare peri-operative and postoperative outcomes of the three different surgical approaches to prostatectomy
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Comparison of Robotic, Retropubic, and Perineal Prostatectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Existing data collected from Prostatectomy Database study and Urology Database study will be analyzed. Compare peri-operative and postoperative outcomes of the three different surgical approaches to prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age Radical Prostatectomy at William Beaumont Hospital Dementia
